   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to pdf-diff-compare tool's documentation!
===================================================
PDF Difference comparison tool is a tool to compare two input pdf files , and
compared text content in it. It takes an excel file as input which contains
columns with new and old files, Tool does a textual comparison of the file
and out the data to an excel file (output.xlsx).

.. image:: pdf-to-text.png
   :alt: PDF Difference comparison tool
   :align: left

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   readme.rst
   Library.rst
